alert.note: Alert for Pike (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 10:20PM CDT until June 16 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN PIKE COUNTY... At 1020 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brundidge, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Troy, Brundidge, Goshen, Banks, Antioch, Troy University, Tennille, Hamilton Crossroads, Monticello, Springhill, Tarentum, Brundidge Municipal Airport, Mossy Grove and Henderson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
